DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Premolar autotransplantation represent effective therapeutic option treatment juvenile dentition traumatic dental injury tooth loss . Numerous study report osteoinductive potency method , however , date quantitative data provide . The objective prospective clinical study quantitatively assess bone soft tissue level autogenous premolar transplantation clinical radiographic parameter . Materials/Methods : In study 26 premolar transplant 20 patient traumatic dental injury ( n=10 ) tooth aplasia ( n=16 ) upper front . Standard clinical parameter evaluate . Based standardized photo documentation , relative soft tissue level measure comparison healthy adjacent teeth . Radiographic finding involve evaluation root resorption , pulp canal obliteration relative bone height . Patient satisfaction determine use standardized questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Premolar Autotransplantation Juvenile Dentition : Quantitative Assessment Vertical Bone Soft Tissue Growth
